Package org.jvnet.hk2.junit

Interface Summary
Hk2Test.Populator  
 

Class Summary
Hk2Runner JUnit runner for hk2 enabled tests.
Hk2Test Super class for hk2 tests, so far to avoid having to annotate with @RunWith
Hk2TestServices Services available to junit tests running with the Hk2Runner runner.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Hk2RunnerOptions Provide options for tuning the behavior of the Hk2Runner.
